full_text: PAKISTAN 5RS. FIVE RUPEES GE and (0) El PAKISTAN THE SPECIAL ADHESIVE ARROND STAMP VENDER A. M.11. Licence 12-12-83 952 Affidavit. Rahim than 80 havif Khan Karachi Pt. rost (quested) Values Rs... of COUNTRY : PAKISTAN. S.S. Stamp Vengers Signature As I, RAHIM KHAN son of ZARIF KHAN, residing at Sultanabad Karachi, Pakistan, being duly sworn deposes and says: 1. That I was born on 14th April, 1932 at Bampokha Swat, Pakistan. 2. That I am the Cousin of Mr. Abdur Rab Khan who was born on 9th March of 1940 at Bampokha ,Swat, Pakistan. That I have known him for 43 years. KAZI OATH 3. That his parents are MR. ABDUL MANAN KHAN Father, and Mother Qimat Jan Khan. 30 4. That at the time of his birth, I resided at BAMPOKHA Swat, Pakistan. Karachi 5. That at the time of his birth (and before) I knew his parents and was personally aware of the event of his birth. 6. That at the time of his birth, I knew his parents ABDUL MANAN KHAN & QIMAT JAN KHAN to be lawfully married. 7. That I have stated the above is being true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. BOLEMALY,AFFIRMED BEFORE Dated Karachi, Pakistan, Johnson Dec. 12.,1983. objer, OBAL a AHIM KHAW Dath Commisioner. RAPACHI 12/dilles
